means: 吸收，消化( assimilate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I never succeeded in assimilating his explanations.
sentence.Network_cn: 我向来无法理解他的解释.

sentence.Network_en: This is the assimilating function of the communist Dao field.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是共产道场的同化功能.

sentence.Network_en: Is assimilating with the Han the same as globalization?
sentence.Network_cn: 汉化跟全球化一样不一样?

PerfectNetExp.abs: material thinking has very strong creativity but its assimilating function is weak ., 物质思维有很强的创造功能 , 但是同化能力很弱.

potassium functioned almost in all metabolic process including photosynthesis , assimilating translocation and distribution , and metabolism of energy , water , nitrogen and so on .钾几乎影响植物体内所有的代谢过程，包括光合作用、同化产物运转和分配、能量代谢、水分代谢、氮素代谢等许多方面。
The act or process of assimilating ., 同化吸收的行为或过程.

list.abs: assimilation product 同化产物assimilation ratio 同化率assimilation rumber 同化数
genetic 遗传的genetic assimilation 遗传同化genetic balance 遗传平�
assimilation process 同化过程assimilation starch 同化淀粉assimilation substance 同化物
assimilation time 同化时间assimilation tissue 同化组织assimilative pigment 同化色素

entry.def: When people such as immigrants assimilate into a community or when that community assimilates them, they become an accepted part of it.

example.ex: There is every sign that new Asian-Americans are just as willing to assimilate...
example.tran: 种种迹象表明新一代亚裔美国人也愿意入乡随俗。

example.ex: His family tried to assimilate into the white and Hispanic communities...
example.tran: 他一家人试图融入白人和西班牙裔社区。

entry.def: If you assimilate new ideas, techniques, or information, you learn them or adopt them.

example.ex: I was speechless, still trying to assimilate the enormity of what he'd told me.
example.tran: 我无话可说，一时还无法接受他对我所说之事的严重性。

means.word_mean: 1. tending to or characterized by or causing assimilation (being absorbed into or incorporated);

auth_sentence.content: It is a question of assimilating or losing their identity altogether.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a question of assimilating or losing their identity altogether.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a question of assimilating or losing their identity altogether.

auth_sentence.content: Superior cultures will dominate and eliminate inferior cultures, after assimilating the better elements.
auth_sentence.res_content: Superior cultures will dominate and eliminate inferior cultures, after assimilating the better elements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Superior cultures will dominate and eliminate inferior cultures, after assimilating the better elements.

auth_sentence.content: He had a hard time assimilating information that he didn't want to believe.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had a hard time assimilating information that he didn't want to believe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had a hard time assimilating information that he didn't want to believe.
